choices.D: single entity that consolidates legal entities
choices.A: single legal entity with security policies
choices.E: single legal entity with default business unit financial dimension
choices.C: single legal entity with custom business unit financial dimension

questions.question_text:
A holding company with three independently managed and operated subsidiaries is implementing Dynamics 365 Finance.
The company needs to ensure the restriction of data for each company from subsidiary counterparts.
You need to determine an organization structure.
Which structure should you recommend?

discussion.content: Since subsidiary is always independent company, it requires separate legal entity always.

Selected Answer: B
B. is correct, he said restriction data

Selected Answer: D
To me it’s more D as it says legal entities (subs) consolidated in a single entity
B is correct for me. I would always recommend to setup a holding company as a separate legal entity to operating companies.
i think D is more accurate he said that its a holding co. so they have to consolidate also the answer include setup for more than one legal entity so it override B

comments.content: Data Restriction point requires separate legal entity, with single legal entity and BU financial dimension we cannot achieve data restriction

questions.question_text:
A company is implementing Dynamics 365 Finance and discussing solutions for data analytics.

The company has the following business requirements:

• Use data from external sources in addition to Dynamics 365 Finance data.
• Collect data from devices for reporting.
• Continuously export data from Dynamics 365 without user intervention.

You need to recommend a solution.

What should you recommend?

discussion.content: Azure data lake is correct answer. Entity store can not connect external data sources. Data lake can connect any data sources. And also export to data lake feature can export F&O data to data lake automatically.

Selected Answer: D
Azure data lake
1. Can store data from external sources
2. Collect data from devices
3. Export to data lake works seamlessly
D .Data lake for sure as there is standard integration supported from d365 to data lake and data lake can have data from other source to unlike entity store

Azure data lake seams to be correct
Entity store cant collect the data from devices
Entity Store is the correct one for collect date and frequently export.
I think Entity Store is correct answer. Power BI cannot collect data from devices, and handle data export continuously
I think power bi is right answer and tick all the boxes

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Finance. The company plans to integrate proprietary solutions by using OData web services.

Some web service integrations have a higher importance than others.

When a lower importance web service integration has larger than expected utilization, higher importance web services must operate as expected.

You need to recommend a solution to meet the integration performance requirements.

What should you recommend?

choices.D: Create the critical web services by using Power Automate integrations.
choices.C: Assign batch priorities to the integrations.
choices.B: Create the critical web services by using Azure Logic Apps.
choices.A: Assign throttling priorities to the integrations.
choices.E: Run the critical integration batch jobs first.

discussion.content:
1) Success by Design > correct
2) Readiness review: As described in the section Success by Design reviews, reviews include project artifacts that the project team produce, and other information such as formal or informal project touchpoints. The availability of such information points to the readiness of the team to schedule and conduct Success by Design reviews.

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

A company plans its Dynamics 365 finance and operations apps implementation.

The implementation must do the following:

• Use an agile methodology.
• Follow Microsoft s recommendations for checks and balances.
• Align with FastTrack touchpoints.

FastTrack touchpoints must be identified and included in the implementation timeline.

You need to integrate FastTrack checks and balances into the implementation methodology.

What should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

A customer deploys Dynamics 365 Customer Service. The customer is implementing Dynamics 365 Finance and Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.

A data management strategy needs to be developed to streamline operations.

You need to determine which tools and services meet the customer’s requirements.

Which tool or service should be used for each requirement? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Correct answers

Question 1 : Dual-write
Question 2 : Export to data lake

Correct answers

Question 1 : Dual-write
Question 2 : BYOD
